languages.text: "Признаться, охота на ксеносов звучит отлично. Они всегда виновны, и правила, касающиеся казни людей, на них не распространяются. Давно хотелось прочистить голову в хорошем бою".

"Honestly, a xenos hunt sounds excellent. The xenos are always guilty, and any rules about the execution of people do not apply to them. I've been itching to clear my head with a good fight for a while now."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, охота на ксеносов звучит отлично. Они всегда виновны, и правила, касающиеся казни людей, на них не распространяются. Давно хотелось прочистить голову в хорошем бою".

traits.locale_text: "I have to admit, a xenos hunt sounds excellent. The xenos are always guilty, and any rules regulating the execution of people do not apply to them. I've been itching to clear my head in a good fight for a while now."

"Honestly, a xenos hunt sounds excellent. The xenos are always guilty, and any rules about the execution of people do not apply to them. I've been itching to clear my head with a good fight for a while now."

languages.text: “老实说，狩猎异形的点子真的很不错。异形生而有罪，所有适用于人类的律法都不适用于它们。我一直都想好好干上一架，让脑子清醒一下。”
languages.original_text: "Honestly, a xenos hunt sounds excellent. The xenos are always guilty, and any rules about the execution of people do not apply to them. I've been itching to clear my head with a good fight for a while now."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，狩猎异形的点子真的很不错。异形生而有罪，所有适用于人类的律法都不适用于它们。我一直都想好好干上一架，让脑子清醒一下。”

languages.text: «La verdad, una cacería de xenos parece excelente. Los xenos siempre son culpables y las reglas sobre ejecutar personas no se les aplican. Llevo tiempo queriendo despejarme con una buena pelea».
languages.original_text: "Honestly, a xenos hunt sounds excellent. The xenos are always guilty, and any rules about the execution of people do not apply to them. I've been itching to clear my head with a good fight for a while now."

traits.locale_text: «La verdad, una cacería de xenos parece excelente. Los xenos siempre son culpables y las reglas sobre ejecutar personas no se les aplican. Llevo tiempo queriendo despejarme con una buena pelea».

languages.text: « Honnêtement, une chasse au xénos me semble une excellente idée. Les xénos sont toujours coupables et les règlements concernant les exécutions humaines ne s'appliquent pas à eux. Cela fait un moment que j'ai très envie de m'éclaircir les idées grâce à un bon combat. »
languages.original_text: "Honestly, a xenos hunt sounds excellent. The xenos are always guilty, and any rules about the execution of people do not apply to them. I've been itching to clear my head with a good fight for a while now."

traits.locale_text: « Honnêtement, une chasse au xénos me semble une excellente idée. Les xénos sont toujours coupables et les règlements concernant les exécutions humaines ne s'appliquent pas à eux. Cela fait un moment que j'ai très envie de m'éclaircir les idées grâce à un bon combat. »

languages.text: 「正直に言って、異種族狩りって最高だ。異種族はいつだって有罪だし、人間に対する処刑の規則なんてやつらには適用されない。しばらく頭をスッキリさせるような良い戦いをしたくてうずうずしてたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Honestly, a xenos hunt sounds excellent. The xenos are always guilty, and any rules about the execution of people do not apply to them. I've been itching to clear my head with a good fight for a while now."

traits.locale_text: 「正直に言って、異種族狩りって最高だ。異種族はいつだって有罪だし、人間に対する処刑の規則なんてやつらには適用されない。しばらく頭をスッキリさせるような良い戦いをしたくてうずうずしてたんだ」

languages.text: "Dürüst olmak gerekirse zeno avı, kulağa harika geliyor. Zenolar her zaman suçludur ve insanların infazına ilişkin hiçbir kural onlara uygulanmaz. Bir süredir iyi bir dövüşle kafamı dağıtmak için can atıyordum."
languages.original_text: "Honestly, a xenos hunt sounds excellent. The xenos are always guilty, and any rules about the execution of people do not apply to them. I've been itching to clear my head with a good fight for a while now."

traits.locale_text: "Dürüst olmak gerekirse zeno avı kulağa harika geliyor. Zenolar her zaman suçludur ve insanların infazına ilişkin hiçbir kural onlara uygulanmaz. Bir süredir iyi bir dövüşle kafamı dağıtmak için can atıyordum."

languages.text: "Ganz ehrlich, eine Xenos-Jagd klingt ausgezeichnet. Xenos sind immer schuldig, und alle Regeln zur Hinrichtung von Personen gelten nicht für sie. Ich hätte schon länger gerne mal wieder einen guten Kampf, um meinen Kopf freizukriegen."
languages.original_text: "Honestly, a xenos hunt sounds excellent. The xenos are always guilty, and any rules about the execution of people do not apply to them. I've been itching to clear my head with a good fight for a while now."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz ehrlich, eine Xenos-Jagd klingt ausgezeichnet. Xenos sind immer schuldig, und alle Regeln zur Hinrichtung von Personen gelten nicht für sie. Ich hätte schon länger gerne mal wieder einen guten Kampf, um meinen Kopf freizukriegen."
